headline.main: ARK ROYAL CAPTAIN PRAISES HIS CREW; Credits Ship With 32 Actions -- Seaman Describes Scene as Carrier Went Down EARLIER NAZI CLAIM FAKED U.S. Writer Says Pilot Never Reported Sinking Craft -- Italy Disclaims Honor

abstract: Maund praises crew; credits ship with 32 actions; U S writer, W Bayles, describes how Germans faked early claim of sinking ship; Itals credit Gormans with sinking
